dmca.title: Copyright Infringement on JAMONCAM Website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Asynchronous LLc [mailto:webmaster@asynchronousllc.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2005 1:38 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: copyright@adobe.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement on JAMONCAM Website


Copyright Infringement on WWWEBMASTERS / JAMONCAM Website

 
All flash server using by Tim GREEN  / WWWEBMASTERS on your server are
piracy.
IP :  70.85.77.181 
 
 <http://www.wwwebmasters.com> http://www.wwwebmasters.com 
http://www.playmateshows.com/
http://www.webcamstrippers.com/
http://www.weblive.com/
 
We can give you full list of website using 
We have send all informations to Adobe, the editor of Flash Server.
 
Thanks-to reply us in this point.
 
For your information 4 company will sue t.Green very soon.
 
Regards,
Braldey Hook
